title: 30 minutes in a game and pain commences
body: So recently I have found that since patch 6.10 it's been taking my client a few seconds to load into a game lobby instead of my normal instant load ins, but that isn't what this is about. Since yesterday with patch 6.16 it's come to my attention that 30 minutes into a game my fps starts tanking for no reason whatsoever. I can have nothing running and yet my fps still tanks like a beast, thus I've come to ask if anyone else has been having these problems since the newest patch.

replies.body: Frame drops could be due to outdated drivers, bad game files, or something else.  Since you're also experiencing trouble in champion select, I'm curious if you're currently running in third party programs.  Apps like play.tv or overwolf have been causing issues for some players, so I would disable those as a first step.  Next, go over our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) for a series of steps to tune up your PC.  Hopefully, your game will be a smooth sail!
